meta.title: An Overview of the Dura Region

nodes.body: The Dura are an ethnic group of northern Nepal who speak a Tibeto-Burman language of the same name. According to the 2001 census of Nepal, 3,397 people speak Dura as a mother tongue and there are 5,169 ethnic Dura. (Mark Turin â€“ June 01, 2004)
nodes.title: An Overview of the Dura Region
